name: Lung non-small cell carcinoma (NOS)
text: Lung adenocarcinoma is the most common form of lung cancer among both smokers and

text.label: non-smokers
text.content: (This category includes individuals who have smoked fewer than 100 cigarettes in their lifetime.)

text: . While adenocarcinomas grow more slowly than other forms of lung cancer, they also tend to

text.label: metastasize
text.content: (Metastasis is a stage of cancer progression in which secondary tumors form at a distance from the primary tumor site. Cancers that spread are more difficult to treat; however, targeted therapies can be effective against primary and secondary tumors.)

text:
at an earlier stage.

Approved targeted therapies exist for lung cancers, and

text.label: comprehensive genomic profiling
text.content: (Tests like FoundationOne can analyze a broad panel of cancer-related genes to discover actionable alterations. Since every patient and every cancer is unique, a single broad analysis can quickly discover a breadth of treatment options for patients.)

text: can detect biomarkers that predict the effectiveness of these drugs. Alterations in the genes

text.label: ALK
text.content: (The *ALK* gene can fuse with other genes like *EML4* to produce a modified enzyme that promotes aggressive cell growth. Drugs in the class tyrosine kinase inhibitors can shrink these tumors.)

text: , ROS1, and EGFR are particularly actionable findings.

name: Acute Myeloid lukhemia
text: LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET, CONSECTETUR ADIPISCING ELIT. QUISQUE UT VESTIBULUM QUAM, NON DICTUM EROS. CRAS INTERDUM NISI UT ACCUMSAN VOLUTPAT. AENEAN LOBORTIS EST EU BIBENDUM CONSECTETUR. FUSCE VARIUS AUGUE SAPIEN, ET SODALES MI RHONCUS UT. PROIN FAUCIBUS AUGUE AC FELIS DAPIBUS, VEL DICTUM TORTOR AUCTOR. VESTIBULUM ELEIFEND LACUS ALIQUET, FERMENTUM DIAM EU, FAUCIBUS NEQUE. UT ULTRICIES ENIM AC ULTRICIES ALIQUAM. NUNC ALIQUAM AT ELIT EU BLANDIT.

text.label: NUNC
text.content: NUNC ENIM ORCI, SCELERISQUE SIT AMET ELEIFEND VITAE, PHARETRA COMMODO TORTOR. DONEC DAPIBUS NIBH NON IPSUM SUSCIPIT MALESUADA. VIVAMUS MOLESTIE ODIO NULLA, SED RHONCUS EROS MOLESTIE UT.

text: PHASELLUS VIVERRA CONSEQUAT MALESUADA. CRAS EGESTAS ERAT AC TINCIDUNT GRAVIDA. PRAESENT DICTUM EU IPSUM SED VESTIBULUM.
